body:
### Code ```rust //- lazy_static/lib.rs pub fn get() { loop {} } //- thread_local/lib.rs extern crate lazy_static; pub const THREAD_ID: fn() = lazy_static::get; ``` ### Meta This somehow only reproduces with cg_clif using `cargo check`. If I switch to `cargo build` it works fine. If I switch to cg_llvm it works fine. Originally reported by @l4l at https://github.com/bjorn3/rustc_codegen_cranelift/issues/973. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.44.0-nightly (7f3df5772 2020-04-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7f3df5772439eee1c512ed2eb540beef1124d236 commit-date: 2020-04-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.44.0-nightly LLVM version: 9.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_mir/monomorphize/collector.rs:754: cannot create local mono-item for DefId(15:3 ~ lazy_static[5373]::get[0]) ```
